title: i charged my acc
body: 18 hours since i charged my acc w rp and i havent received it yet. im freaking out {{item:3070}}

replies.body: We can help with this through a [player support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Since it's a sensitive account issue, we'd prefer to help out with your specific issue individually.  We look forward to helping you out!
Send in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), account information can be sensitive over the boards.
